body: @ebetica as I understand @fmassa proposes to change the signature, not the name. I agree that it would be best to keep it consistent with TH's `addmm` signature.
body_html: @ebetica as I understand @fmassa proposes to change the signature, not the name. I agree that it would be best to keep it consistent with TH's addmm signature.
